name: AP_CLAIM_NOTES
description: The AP_CLAIM_NOTES table contains information about the notes that are attached to each claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim to which the note is attached.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: Note identifier. Can be used to join to tables such as HNO_INFO and NOTE_ENC_INFO.

columns.name: NOTE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the note was created.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the note associated with the claim record.

columns.name: NOTE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
